channel.title: How do I make my character commands work?
channel.description: Hey. How do I make the commands that I make work? I made one and when Id compile (Itd be the same as an item command) and itd say 63 errors... Then i could fix it... and when i edited tools to make it ::cash, it worked... so when it said commandstartswith("tools")) i changed it to ("cash")) and made the items that appear turn into cash... and it worked. I also added text to it so when you pick it up it said "Youre now rich"... I had to delete that later on when I tried to make my own... but itll be back. So my question is how do I make the commands I make work??? (and i copied the exact thing below it aaaand also put the {,}, and ; in the right place... along with the spaces)

item.title: How do I make my character commands work?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Hey. How do I make the commands that I make work? I made one and when Id compile (Itd be the same as an item command) and itd say 63 errors… Then i could fix it… and when i edited tools to make it ::cash, it worked… so when it said commandstartswith(“tools”)) i changed it to (“cash”)) and made the items that appear turn into cash… and it worked. I also added text to it so when you pick it up it said “Youre now rich”… I had to delete that later on when I tried to make my own… but itll be back. So my question is how do I make the commands I make work??? (and i copied the exact thing below it aaaand also put the {,}, and ; in the right place… along with the spaces)

Read full topic
